transcript.comment: CHI and MIT are playing in the living room .

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: brings a loop of beads to MIT

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: puts the loop on CHI's head

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at a picture of a train

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: takes a container with magnet letters/numbers

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: walks to a closet with a metal door

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: d i s i p e
takes the container to the closet

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: opens the door and looks inside

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: puts a number 8 on the door

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: puts the letter K on the door

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: puts the letter O on the door

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: turns over the container with the letters and numbers

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: finds a plastic dog among the letters and numbers

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: puts the letter 3 on the door

u.speaker: MOT
u.flatTier: shows a piece of paper and a box of crayons on the table

u.speaker: MOT
u.flatTier: shows the drawer of the table

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: takes the crayon box from MOT

u.speaker: MOT
u.flatTier: opens a large sheet of paper

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: k e t a tS e

u.speaker: MOT
u.flatTier: moves the paper shita that CHI does not draw on the table

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: d E s b r E

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: tries to take out more crayons out of the box

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: d a s f r E

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: draws circles on the eyes of the face

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at the circles CHI drew on the eyes

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: draws hair-like things on the face .

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: o S 3r t ae,: d ae

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: draws scribble all on the face

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: h o g o g o,:

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: draws a line on the picture of an orange crayon on the box .

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at the orange crayon on the box

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at the orange crayon in CHI's hand

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at the crayon and the picture of a crayon on the box

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: draws, then hands MIT a yellow crayon

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at what CHI has just drawn

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at the blue crayon CHI is holding and the picture on the box

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at different crayons on the box

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: o,: d e b u w o

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: tries to draw on the table

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: w u m aI k j a,: r o

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: draws a long line that goes off the paper

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: rubs off the crayon on the table

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: h E p 3r F E tS

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: rubs the crayon off the table surface with tissue paper

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: rubs his drawing on the paper with the tissue
